sources.title: Fighting Men
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

metadata.Plot: A famous writer visits an aircraft carrier during the Korean war to learn more about it and the way it's run. He also gets to find out more about the Navy and Marine aviators themselves, their internal and external conflicts and dangers of their job.
metadata.Writer: James A. Michener, Harry A. Burns, Art Cohn
metadata.Actors: Van Johnson, Walter Pidgeon, Louis Calhern
